text: Marco Antônio may refer to: * Marco Antônio (footballer, born 1951), Brazilian footballer * Marco Antônio (footballer, born 1963), Brazilian footballer * Marco Antônio (footballer, born 1978), Brazilian footballer * Marco Antônio Miranda Filho (born 1984), Brazilian footballer, known as Marco Antônio * Marco Antônio (footballer, born 2000), Brazilian footballer ==See also== *
